subject_terms_3: Vanishing trade Textile art and design
physical_appearance: These are bottles containing beads in various shades. The bottles are of varied sizes, and are placed in a curved row.
sgcool_label_text: These bottles contain beads in hues of dark blue, light blue, green, red, and white. Embroiderers would unstring the beads and categorise them by placing them into small bottles for use. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses, working from home as she did not have a shop.
subject_terms_1: Peranakan sewing tools tailors beadwork (visual works)
subject_terms_2: Beads Peranakan (Asian people) Sewing Equipment and supplies Tailors Clothing trade Bead embroidery
